statements: SELECT * FROM LeadershipTraining;
SELECT participant_name, training_date FROM LeadershipTraining;
SELECT participant_id, progress_percentage FROM LeadershipTraining;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipTraining ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, progress_percentage FROM LeadershipTraining WHERE training_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipTraining WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT participant_name, training_duration FROM LeadershipTraining WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT participant_name, training_duration, progress_percentage FROM LeadershipTraining WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM LeadershipTraining WHERE training_duration > 30 AND progress_percentage < 100 ORDER BY participant_id
SELECT * FROM LeadershipTraining WHERE training_duration > 20 AND progress_percentage BETWEEN 20 AND 80
SELECT * FROM leadership_training_attendance;
SELECT training_date, training_subject FROM leadership_training_attendance ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, attendance_status FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT training_module, progress_percentage FROM training_progress ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage >= 50;
SELECT * FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE attendance_status = True ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, training_subject FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, training_module, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE training_subject = 'Communication Skills' ORDER BY training_date, employee_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, progress_percentage, completion_date FROM training_progress WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY completion_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM leadership_training_attendance;
SELECT attendee_id, training_session_date FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT skill_area, proficiency_level FROM professional_development WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT attendee_id FROM training_progress ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, training_module, completion_date FROM training_progress WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT attendee_id, training_session_date, attendance_status FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present' ORDER BY training_session_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, training_module, completion_date FROM training_progress WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT attendee_id, skill_area, proficiency_level FROM professional_development WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY skill_area ASC, proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT attendance_status, COUNT(*) AS total_attendees FROM leadership_training_attendance GROUP BY attendance_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT attendee_id, training_module, MAX(completion_date) AS latest_completion_date FROM training_progress GROUP BY attendee_id ORDER BY latest_completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM training_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, attendance_date FROM training_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, module_id, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM training_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, module_id, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage >= 80.00;
SELECT attendee_id, event_id, attendance_status, attendance_date FROM training_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_id, full_name FROM attendees WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE trainer_id = 'c6f9709a-1b9a-4e8f-b26c-596dd1fb621e';
SELECT session_name, trainer_id FROM training_sessions WHERE session_id = '272f2d38-ab2b-475c-a3da-4b0a9009547f';
SELECT a.full_name, t.trainer_name FROM attendees a JOIN trainers t ON a.attendee_id = t.trainer_id;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM attendees;
SELECT session_name, trainer_name, specialty FROM training_sessions JOIN trainers ON training_sessions.trainer_id = trainers.trainer_id;
SELECT attendee_id, training_session_id, attendance_date FROM leadership_training_attendance WHERE attendance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT trainer_id, trainer_name FROM trainers WHERE specialty = 'Leadership';
SELECT training_session_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM trainer_feedback GROUP BY training_session_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
